website_summaries.verdict: A reliable jazz shoe that meets the needs of rehearsal or performance.
pros: Fits almost true to size for most
Shoes slip on easily yet fit snugly
Hold up well for several weeks of practice or performance
cons: Could use a little more interior cushioning
A little tight around the ankle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before so I knew that they ran a tad on the small size (I wear a 7.5 so I purchased an 8) so I bought a half size larger...they are perfect! My previous pair lasted 3 years of heavy use and I expect I will get another 3 years from this new pair! Very very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, size too big
customer_reviews.text: The quality is decent for the price, but the size is a bit too large. I wear US size 7M, so ordered the same size. Just received the shoes yesterday, about a size too big. Wanted to keep them, but decided to return and order a smaller size after walking around the house for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: simplejoy

customer_reviews.title: 14M = 12.5 Women's Street Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest size (14M) and I wear an 11.5 women's street shoe. It was a little too big. I think a 13M would fit 11.5 women's street shoe. I hope that helps other folks understand the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: science teacher

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL, HUGE, HORRIBLE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: These were a waste of money. If you are a person who dances a lot, just don't do it. You get what you pay for. I went by the size chart and I would estimate that these are at least 1.5 sizes too big for me, perhaps 2. The color is...awful. It's not tan, it's not any semi-natural looking color. I blame myself for ordering the cheap shoes instead of just getting my usual bloch or capezios. Don't be like me, my children.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter. I actually bought them one size larger than her shoe size so that it would give her a tad bit more room. Previous experience has taught me that they typically run kind of snug. Anyway, the shipping was fast. I would definitely purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who wears a women's size 6. The advice I always go by, and what's suggested in the listing, is to purchase a size up. We've purchased many, many jazz shoes through the years so I know the drill. These were really big - as in she had an inch of room! Maybe that's why this ONE size was $13 less than all the other sizes?
customer_reviews.author: Living Abroad

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: If you need shoes for a single performance in a school play, these will work. Order then well in advance so that you can get replacements as needed. If you want to use these regularly or weekly, get something else. The first pair we ordered had two different sizes - one about an inch larger than the other. The second order was closer and sufficient for a single day's use. The shoes began to fall apart (glue was not sticking) after the single day of use. This just seems like an incredibly inferior product and most of what you're paying for is the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely and looked great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for an inexpensive solution for my daughter's junior high musical costume. She's not a dancer but needed jazz shoes for a month of rehearsals and 4 performances, so didn't want to spend a lot. They fit nicely and looked great. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PritchFam

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok for dance classes once a week.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. There is some wear on the bottom of the shoes already and we’ve only had them for about two months (if that). Not thrilled with the quality. If they were worn more than once a week, I think they would be in the trash by now.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: On point
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got ready for dance camp and had outgrown her old jazz shoes. These were just what we expected. They fit well, about the same width/support/fit as we've had in the past. More importantly, she continues to dance rather than walk, and these are on point for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, well fitting, and durable!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and held up well during the month long run of the musical I was in! They were comfy and didn’t irritate my feet at all. I have a wide foot and where other dance shoes sometimes cut into the front of the foot just behind the ball of the foot, I had no problems like that with these.
customer_reviews.author: Susann H

customer_reviews.title: Nice dance shoe... daughter is spinning like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I bought these for my daughter who is not a “professional” dancer, but she has been doing pirouettes around the house so much she has destroyed her socks so o figured best to invest in some simple dance shows and these certainly for the bill. She is a US7 and the shoes for well... she has a long narrow foot. I bought the blush colour. Not surprisingly she is able to spin even better now. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CDN in Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: Run very large!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem to be high quality considering the price but I just ordered my third pair because they run very large. I am a size 9.5 (or sometimes 10) in street shoes Amazon recommended I buy size 10. I looked at the size chart and they recommended I get a 10.5. Considering jazz shoes stretch, I got 10’s. As soon as I tried them on I knew they were way too big with more than a half inch of extra space. Then I got 9.5’s. Still way too big. I just ordered 9’s and am hoping they fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: May Rave

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality, but I should’ve ordered my regular size instead of ordering a half size up. I wish they had slightly more cushioning on the ball of the foot but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone who wears a 6 in capezio brand and a 5.5 in this shoe. Her everyday shoes vary and range between girls size 4 to woman size 6 which makes buying shoes online tricky, but a middle of the road guess of size 5.5, fit perfectly. They are very lightweight and perfect for their intent she’s not a dancer but performs in stage plays and musicals with some light dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors are way off!!! Beware before purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows an almost pink to nude colored shoe and I purchased the shoes based on this image. Even when I clicked on the choices for color, the only two options were black and nude. Well, I am curious as to what they consider to be nude since what I received was a light brown or dark tan color. Not happy at all and if my daughter's dance teacher does not approve of the color, they definitely will be getting returned!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Cartelli DeCicco

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used for marching band due to mess up with regular orders. They fit nicely but would not suggest marching in them like we used them for.
customer_reviews.author: Shortyhas

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 12 year old daughter who was starting jazz class. She wears a 7.5 normally and I ordered a 7 she says it fits fine. Arrived quickly. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend ordering at least a size down
customer_reviews.text: The quality of shoe is OK for the price but they are WAY too big. I would recommend ordering at least a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jean Cooper

customer_reviews.title: They seem like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT go buy the measurement guide!!!! They seem like a good product. I am sending them back for my daughter's street shoe size that would be 2 sizes bigger than the measurement guide.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of One

customer_reviews.title: Too big and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually between a 7 and a 7.5. Jazz shoes are supposed to be snug so I went with a 7 and it fit like an 8. It keeps slipping off my heels and I can’t dance right because they keep almost falling off. They also look and feel cheap. Kinda sharp-ish edges where my foot goes in and it hurts my ankles and they do not grip the floor on any part of the shoe whatsoever. I guess you get what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: It is the defect item.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy about the price then realized later I got a pair of defect shoes. It was sewed unevenly and left a big gap on the right side of the shoe. The material feels good and we received it quickly. The picture shows shoes in pinkish color, but it actually came in light brown color
customer_reviews.author: CC BEACON LIVING

customer_reviews.title: First pair of jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: My foot is narrow and I have a difficult time finding shoes that fit well, so I added some foam insoles to these shoes to help the fit. I was surprised that there is no real support structure to the shoes . This is the first pair of jazz shoes that I've purchased so I don't know if this is how that all are or not. I can glide across the dancefloor though!
customer_reviews.author: kitten

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said extremely uncomfortable but she has sensory
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used in production but said painful. She is extremely high maintenance though on sensory issues. All jazz shoes may be that way. They practiced for five to eight hours at a time. Otherwise great and nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Taking Action!

customer_reviews.title: Great Dance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine, nice dance shoes that I wear for Zumba, very comfortable, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nawaz

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 and that's what I ordered. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a dupe for the Caprzio Showstopper
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was way bigger than expected. The heel on both shows was not flat, which made them very uncomfortable. No where near a dupe for the Capezio Showstopper
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Shaped a little weird
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoe flares out below the ankle. The fit is ok, they are just shaped a little strange. A little too wide for my daughters narrow foot, but that can't be helped without being able to try on before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bow

customer_reviews.title: Fit was much better than store brand shoes
customer_reviews.text: These jazz shoes were much more comfortable and easy to put on as compared to other brands at the stores (Payless and academy). Price was competitive to store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her Lyrical class. She says they are perfect and comfortable. She wears a size 6 in shoes but I bought these in a size 7 and they were a perfect fit. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Both shoes fell apart second wear it was also really big not ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Claudia W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in a 10 but has a wife foot We ordered an 11. They are alittle lose but feel great.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Fit is much too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based off the measuring instructions, and they are easily an inch too long. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: GA-Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected
customer_reviews.text: These are dance shoes. No support and no padding but look exactly as shown and are great for dance purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Green

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always have hard time getting my pre-teen daughter wide enough jazz shoes. These were perfect fit and she is very happy with them. I hope they can last us entire dance year
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy D

customer_reviews.title: Get these shoes for your dancer!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were true to fit, comfortable for my daughter, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is good quality however it was too large so we will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: M Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wide feet so they didn’t fit well with only the small stretchy bit on top.
customer_reviews.author: R. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: No difference between size 4 and 4,5
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are ok, but have problem with sizes. I measured my daughter's feet and it was 8,5 inches, so I ordered size 4,5 as suggested by supplier. However, they were too large for her. I decided to keep the pair for next year and bought smaller size 4. But size 4 shoes turned out to be exactly same size as 4,5. Photo is attached. What show size I have to order now?
customer_reviews.author: Indira

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore them for a play and wanted to wear them all day. She loved them. I did size up
customer_reviews.author: Melrey

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed a basic jazz shoe for Middle School play. This was a reasonably priced shoe that fits the bill. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Napoli

customer_reviews.title: worked amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my daughter class and I never her complain about arch pain or anything and thats a big thing for a hypermobile child
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Size of the order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8.5 and got size 14 ... rediculous ... I’m not happy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made with cheaper material. But it will work for class. I'll to buy another pair for competition's
customer_reviews.author: Angelaw

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality for the price. They fit a little small. But we were hoping they weren’t big.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfect - I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time we’ve ordered. First time too big and we had to return. It was a smooth return
customer_reviews.author: lisa henson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is not what described in the picture, and it ran to large.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit just right and are a good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like leather. Very plastic look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Super wide
customer_reviews.text: Super wide !!! I ended up not using them for the performance .
customer_reviews.author: Warrior905

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These run very small. We had to exchange abd are going to try two sizes larger
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Overall good dance show
customer_reviews.text: Very good dance shoes for My teenage daughter. She just started dance so they are perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Warden

customer_reviews.title: Fit and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, as needed and required for high school music theater.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Jazz Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good quality. I purposely purchased a size slightly bigger. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel R.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Sizes must run smaller than normal shoe sizes because these were half the size of my daughters foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Fast arrival. Size chart is accurate! My daughter normally wears a size 8 in shoes but we used their size chart and found it to be accurate with a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay..
customer_reviews.text: No problems with her wearing thm, just a little on the wide side, her foot is really narrow tho. But Great for the class.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Totally junk- returned immediately. Really wide in the heal and just ridiculous really.
customer_reviews.author: lauren s

customer_reviews.title: Good dancing shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are in a good quality and reached my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline .

customer_reviews.title: Love these dance shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size up and fit was perfect. I wear 8 - I ordered 8 1/2. I was so happy with the fit and softness. I recommend these dance shoes! Great price too! Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Jdancealot

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend that the manufacturer creates a similar model for bellydancers
customer_reviews.text: I am a bellydance instructor. Wear the shoes when teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very nice for the price and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice B.

customer_reviews.title: Too wide to wear to dance
customer_reviews.text: My feet are narrow, and these shoes were just too wide. They gapped when I walked. I could not have danced in them. I wear an 8, and that’s what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Order this shoe twice for my daughter first time wrong size arrived. 2nd time 2 left shoes arrived. Each time I wasted my gas and time returning them.
customer_reviews.author: April Davis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters play, they didnt even last 2 full weeks bf falling apart. complete waste of time and money. Do yourself a favor and dont buy these
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was a perfect fit for my daughter's feet. I will definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 right feet. The interior footbed was also not even connected to the sole. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my daughter who was in a play and shoes came very quickly and were a perfect fit. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Boniello

customer_reviews.title: She said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Size was accurate. Got them for my daughter to wear in a play. She said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Randa Ghantous

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my classroom shoes as we learn to walk peacefully and carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: The color is beige not pink, the picture is misleading. It doesn't form to the foot well
customer_reviews.author: Karena C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes. Perfect fit. Fast shipping. Recommend seller :)
customer_reviews.author: stephania

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, true to size. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Philippa Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Looks more narrow in the picture then it is.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit properly too loose and need bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From the end of the shoe it was a little to big.
customer_reviews.text: From the end of the shoe it was a little to big.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 pair for my son.I measured his feet and chose based on size chart.The jazz shoes are great and will continue to buy as his foot grows.They are soft and comfortable with a reasonable price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit somewhat strangely around the ankle. Not my favorite, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When the shoes came in they were2 different sizes and too big
customer_reviews.author: Starla M.

customer_reviews.text: I was told they run small so order a larger size. They are true to size,
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ramshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is growing so fast and I need to buy new dance shoes for her every year. I appreciate being able to find a nice jazz shoe for a decent price. Thank you so much. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Points

product_meta.title: Linodes Women's Leather Upper Jazz Shoe Slip-on with Elastic Top Piece
feature_bullets: Leather Upper Material with elastic top piece
Split sole, EVA sole patch and heel
Standard size, corresponding heel to toe length is listed in product description
